title: Romeo Opens Up About A Book That Changed His Mindset For The Better
description:
Our Producer Romeo has been on a wellness journey lately, and his mindset is starting to change. It started when he finally decided to visit a doctor about his anxiety.
And now, the book "The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck", has changed his life too. Not only does he see life differently, but this book has also helped him handle situations differently.
Listen...
